stories.title: The National Archives Public Information Films (UK)
Strong Eventual Consistency and Conflict-Free Replicated Data Types (2016)

stories.text:
Hello HN,

I was wondering what is the simpler way to go about building a tool to process incoming emails. I would like to build a tool that processes the content and trigger some automation.

AFAIK, the most raw way of doing that would be to run a server that polls an email server (SMTP or Pop3) for new messages.

I was wondering if there is a cloud offering that allows for minimizing the infra footprint and allows for focusing on the business logic (parsing out the email contents ... etc). For example, what if we had app engine but only for email. Is there any such thing?
stories.title: Easiest way to automate processing incoming emails

stories.text:
Hello IESG Members:

Lars Eggert, NetApp Murray Kucherawy, Facebook Erik Kline, Google Éric Vyncke, Cisco Warren Kumari, Google Robert Wilton, Cisco John Scudder, Juniper Roman Danyliw, CERT/SEI Benjamin Kaduk, Akamai Technologies Martin Duke, F5 Networks, Inc Zaheduzzaman Sarker, Ericsson Mirja Kühlewind, Ericsson Alexa Morris, Association Management Solutions

I seek the removal of the aforementioned infringing material from your servers and any other public or private repositories and from any other location the IETF or the IETF Trust controls or has access too including but not limited to mailing lists and email conversations. I request that you immediately notify the infringer of this notice and inform them of their duty to remove the infringing material immediately, and notify them to cease any further posting or transfering or using of infringing material in the future. I am providing this notice in good faith and with the reasonable belief that rights owned by me are being infringed. Under penalty of perjury I certify that the information contained in the notification is both true and accurate, and I have the authority to act on behalf of the owner of the copyright(s) involved.

Timothy McSweeney /s/TIMOTHY MCSWEENEY/ 950a Union Rd #432 West Seneca, NY 14224
